name: Fresh Organic Lychee
details: Delicious organic lychees, handpicked for maximum sweetness and freshness. Ideal for snacking or juicing.
review_1: Absolutely the sweetest lychees I’ve had in a while!
review_2: Fresh and juicy. Great for summer treats.

name: Premium Thai Lychee
details: Imported lychees from Thailand, known for their large size, juicy flesh, and floral aroma.
review_1: These are huge and super flavorful. Worth the price.
review_2: Tastes like the ones I had in Thailand!

name: Frozen Seedless Lychee Pack
details: Convenient seedless lychees, peeled and frozen. Perfect for smoothies, desserts, and cocktails.
review_1: Perfect for smoothies—no need to peel or seed!
review_2: Great quality for frozen fruit. Very convenient.

name: Dried Lychee Snacks
details: Sweet and chewy dried lychee slices, great as a healthy snack or baking ingredient.
review_1: A little too sweet for me, but tasty overall.
review_2: Love these as a snack at work.

name: Lychee Juice Concentrate
details: Pure lychee juice concentrate with no added sugar, perfect for cocktails and refreshing drinks.
review_1: Fantastic flavor! Great in cocktails and sparkling water.
review_2: Strong lychee taste, just a bit pricey.

name: Lychee Honey
details: Natural honey infused with lychee flavor, harvested from lychee orchards.
review_2: Smooth and floral. My new favorite honey.

name: Lychee Sorbet
details: Refreshing lychee sorbet made from real fruit, dairy-free and vegan-friendly.
review_2: I love that it’s vegan and full of real fruit flavor.

name: Lychee-flavored Green Tea
details: Delicate green tea infused with natural lychee flavor for a fragrant and soothing experience.
review_2: Good value and makes a nice cold brew.

name: Lychee Fruit Jam
details: Sweet and tangy lychee jam made with organic fruits, perfect for toast or desserts.
review_1: Amazing on toast! The tangy sweetness is perfect.
review_2: Great as a topping for cheesecake too.

name: Lychee Bubble Tea Kit
details: DIY bubble tea kit with lychee flavor, tapioca pearls, and tea bags included.
review_1: Easy to make and super fun with friends.
review_2: Tastes just like store-bought bubble tea!

name: Lychee Essential Oil
details: Pure lychee essential oil for aromatherapy and skin care, extracted naturally.
review_1: Smells heavenly! Great for my diffuser.
review_2: I use it in skincare and it’s very gentle.

name: Canned Lychee in Syrup
details: Ready-to-eat lychee fruit canned in sweet syrup, ideal for desserts and drinks.
review_1: Convenient and tasty, though a bit too sweet.
review_2: Perfect for desserts. Kids love them.
